Reviews.Title: “Ok, but certainly not 4 star”
Reviews.Author: Gaetan S
Reviews.Content: ive returned dubai stayed golden tulip 3 nights overall ok experience wouldnt return firstly allocated smelt bad stale cigarette smoke moved porters sprayed air freshener left didnt help lived kept clothes bags times water shower brown worrying sounded airconditioning unit outside window 6th floor loud night reckon people loud nightclub ground floor reception recommend request bar floor noisy football wifi free barstaff lot choice breakfast wouldnt recommend cooked buffet experienced hotel start week alternatives pork understandably veal bacon chicken beef sausages found bread fruit option slated hotel staff super friendly pool nice relax swim lengths cool hotel conveniently metro stop sharaf dg stop mall emirates wouldnt bother using train walk 10 minutes unless scorching hot hotel cheap week id recommend looking elsewhere definitely 4 star hotel

Reviews.Title: “Great Hotel! Fantastic value for money!”
